info.name: BCT Server API
info.description: Postman collection covering all API endpoints exposed by the Fiber server.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for admin and user authentication flows.

item.name: Admin Dashboard
item.description: Analytics and overview endpoints (admin token required).

item.name: CRM Entities
item.description: Company, client, counterparty, contract, and funnel management.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Barcode Scanner X1",
  "ads_title": "High-speed scanner",
  "images": ["/uploads/x1.png"],
  "description": "Industrial-grade barcode scanner.",
  "guarantee": "24 months",
  "serial_number": "SCN-X1-001",
  "shtrix_number": "1234567890123",
  "price": 1499000,
  "discount": 100000,
  "category_id": "{{categoryId}}",
  "top_category_id": "{{topCategoryId}}",
  "count": 100,
  "NDC": 200000,
  "tax": 150000
}

item.name: Content & Media
item.description: Remaining content-driven models using shared CRUD semantics.

item.name: Generic Collections
item.description: Template requests for CRUD resources backed by the shared generic handlers (vendors, projects, vendors-about, experiments, company-stats, reviews, sertificates, licenses, news, partners, admins, currency, banners, select-reviews, backgrounds, contacts, banner-sorts, top-category-sorts, category-sorts).
